name: Scaffold
description: Layout scaffold with headers, footers, and loading indicators.

use: you need a structured page layout with headers and footers.

examples.minimal:
Scaffold(
  headers: const [AppBar(title: Text('Title'))],
  child: const Text('Content'),
)

theming: `ScaffoldTheme` controls background colors and loading sparks.
accessibility: Ensure headers and footers remain reachable on small screens.
dont: Overload headers with too many controls.
